entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE 2022-41089 | .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #242

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • It should be clearer why Guid.NewGuid fails in a .NET 7 wasmconsole (because crypto is not present in NodeJS by default) #79683
  • [API Proposal]: Support getting IUnknown for ComWrappers RCWs #79679
  • [API Proposal]: Add ability to safely get the managed object from a ComWrappers CCW #79674
  • Generate and embed _version.c in Windows native binaries #79673
  • Running a dll with dotnet6.0.11 fails with error code HRESULT: 0x80004005 #79668
  • Test failure: Interop/ObjectiveC/ObjectiveCMarshalAPI/ObjectiveCMarshalAPI/ObjectiveCMarshalAPI.sh #79664
    8.0.0
  • 关于 HttpClient.PostAsync 使用JsonContent 时的问题 #79663
  • Test failure: Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_45929/test45929/test45929.sh #79662
  • System.Text.Json Source Generator System.NotSupported exception for IEnumerable Implementations #79661
  • PerformanceCounterCategory.ReadCategory is taking large memory allocation #79660
  • Support Dynamic Configuration in .NET GC #79658
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: StringSyntaxAttribute.Guid #79655
  • Socket connect with payload via SocketAsyncEventArgs fails #79654
    8.0.0
  • Cannot Bind LdapConnection to multiple servers on Linux #79653
  • Backward binary compatibility #79650
  • [Convert.FromHexString] The input is not a valid hex string as it contains a non-hex character. #79649
  • dotnet-counters: Missing System.Runtime-Counters when publishing a trimmed app #79648
  • Expired Helix queue windows.10.amd64.client21h1.open failing 6.0 CI run #79646
  • [API Proposal]: FileSharingViolationException #79643
  • TypeLoadException when struct contains nullable static field of itself #79636
  • Consider getting rid of DumpNativeResources task #79634
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: add method to directly round double to decimal #79631
    8.0.0

Closed

  • API documentation debt - System.ComponentModel #43852
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Use a latest stable Chrome, or close to it for running tests #73835
    8.0.0
  • ILLink has a commented PackageId in runtime #78073
    8.0.0
  • Range check helper getting called with unaligned stack #78092
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] ILLinker `InvalidOperationException` on perf pipeline #77444
    8.0.0
  • outerloop legs failing to detect `dotnet` #76755
  • BackgroundService handles Exceptions getting thrown differently when tasks are not faulted vs faulted #36388
    Future
  • JIT.Regression\JitBlue\Runtime_31615\Runtime_31615\Runtime_31615 fails #79170
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!m_VariableLiveRanges->back().m_EndEmitLocation.Valid()' #73355
    8.0.0
  • JIT doesn't optimize away redundant checks for Span.Length #9608
    Future
  • JIT: generated code for generic static method with `Nullable<T>` can be optimized #9677
    Future
  • Regex never completes #79596
  • Code annotation for Exceptions #79647
  • Vulnerability CVE 2022-41064 comes via EntityFramework 6.3.0 #79641
  • Excessive/strange null reference checks after method inlining #10461
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add Generic AddRange overloads to List and similar to improve performance #79593
  • Design capability APIs #24259
    Future
  • Windows Service Error 1053 #77861
    Future
  • GetCodeHeaderData returns E_FAIL #79462
  • Test failure JIT/jit64/regress/vsw/539509/test1/test1.sh #79430
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ICopyable<T> #77077

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono][interp] Allow passing vtypes with a single scalar field to nat… #79686
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] dotnet-runtime-perf: Fix V8 version to 11.0.162 #79682
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • Fixes #79558 #79681
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove some dead code from the legacy SIMD support #79680
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS] Run more tests on the rolling build #79678
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remaining feedback from ILLink merge #79677
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] Moving 'fgMorphUModToAndSub' to happen a little earlier #79676
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS][tvOS] Skip NullableTests.ClassWithDictionariesWithNullableValues #79675
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Include GC in the default rundown keyword for eventpipe #79671
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [Draft] Isolating `instruction` to `instrDesc` refactor changes. #79670
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix ConnectAsync with buffer on Windows #79669
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Upgrade .NET Framework queue #79667
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Upgrade .NET Framework queue #79666
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Upgrade .NET Framework queue #79665
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Split TryRead implementation into TryPopulate and TryCreateObject #79659
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix/multi server ldap binding linux #79657
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [wasm] fix aotProfiler init #79651
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] WasmDebugLevel in samples #79644
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Ensure that OptionsCache only permits creating a single options instance per name #79639
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fixed array delete in debugger.cpp #79638
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - Fold 'x & 255' and 'x & 65535' to a cast #79630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [wasm] Add the illink substitutions for SIMD #79672
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Properly mark compilation as having throw helpers in debug codegen #79504
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix `IDesignerSerializationManager` nullability #79429
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Revert "Fix up NativeAOT testing" & don't build clr.runtime for libraries AOT tests #79637
    area-Infrastructure
  • This fixes emitGetVexPrefixSize to support detecting 2-byte prefix support #79478
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix libraries outerloop pipelines #79652
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Outline exception throws in the interp and ifdef out unreachable opcodes #79239
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] `browser-bench`: Enable the String task #79640
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix workloads build step in official builds #79656
    area-Infrastructure
  • Change RunningPublish property name to _IsPublishing #79483
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Create Microsoft.NET.ILLink.Tasks package #79609
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2067118 #79632
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add kunalspathak mentionee for codegen-coreclr #79635
    area-Meta
  • Always set `addlDelta` to zero on x86 #79467
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use non-generic Array.Sort in EnumInfo on nativeaot #79473

Updated

  • Produce crashreport.json and use llvm-symbolizer to create stack trace #77578
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • JIT: experiment with early liveness and use it for forward sub and last-use copy elision #79346
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove RequiresDynamicCode from Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #79425
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [wasm][debugger] Trying to fix firefox flaky tests on CI. #75090
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Thin locks #79519
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ensure that `TryGetContainableHWIntrinsicOp` is non-mutating #79363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [release/7.0] [mono][interp] Add unbox when calling valuetype method through delegate #79614
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 7.0.x
  • Double IndexOf throughput for chars #78861
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Disable loop alignment during asmdiffs #79629
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add nullable reference type annotations to System.Text.Json source gen #79613
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Do not overallocate SocketAddress.Buffer #78860
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Add version info to NativeAOT Unix apps #79623
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Hosting DirectSettingsOverrideConfigurationSetting and ConfigurationSettingCanInfluenceEnvironment test failures in CI #79455
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [wasm] optional legacy JS interop #79622
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Refactor gtExtractSideEffList and fix GTF_DEBUG_NODE_MORPHED propagation #79611
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - `CAST` removals for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve "one asg morphing" and move it to `morphblock.cpp` #79037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasi] compile with libs.native #79046
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Be more precise about choosing what to DNER in block morphing #77980
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disallow `IND<struct>` except as a source of `STORE_DYN_BLK` #74784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fix compression #79547
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] Fix compression #79549
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Wasm jiterpreter cleanup and bug fixes pt. 4 #79324
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Stop producing and handling `ADDR` nodes #78246
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ifdef out unsupported Enum underlying types for nativeaot #79472
  • Fix perf. regression caused by signed/unsigned comp #79137
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Re-Enable SendRecvPollSync_TcpListener_Socket Test #79145
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Optimize constrained calls made from gsharedvt methods. #79339
    NO-MERGE
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove System.Text.Json prebuilt #79600
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] Initial support for unloadable ALCs #77399
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Make WriteCommentValue() overloads have same behavior; Make the Utf8JsonWriter always insert newlines between the end of comments and the start of arrays or objects #75074
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Reduce the number of forced `MethodTable`s #79594
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Partially fix issue caused during VS upgrade #79572
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.14
  • Use Roslyn support for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan (or field caching downlevel) #79461
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta
  • Allow preinitializing types with canonical forms #79384
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: loop hoisting assert #2116

PullRequests

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Trunc llvm values when building GT_STORE_IND to a smaller int type #2115

Updated

  • Merge to last NativeAot commit #2111
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Exception handling: funclets #2109
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet test does no longer accept a project path after updating to NET 7.0.101 #29543
  • dotnet test /clp:ErrorsOnly not working after upgrade to 7.0.101 #29542
  • `dotnet watch` support for launching program in a different working directory #29539
  • "dotnet tool restore" failing when run concurrently in CI -- DotnetToolSettings.xml locked #29535

Closed

  • Microsoft.DotNet.ApiSymbolExtensions binary is missing from the SDK, causing API compat failures in 8.0 #29511
  • dotnet workload install produces garbage output on non en-us systems. #29231
  • .NET 7 gitignore template miss .idea (JetBrains Rider) exclusion #29224

PullRequests

Created

  • fix locale-sensitive comparison of UnmatchedArgument error strings #29559
    Area-DotNet Test
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [Backport] Prevent `dotnet test` verbosity from being ignored #29557
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve generation of nested type symbols. #29552
    Area-GenAPI
  • Use File.OpenRead when loading tool configuration (7.x backport) #29549
  • Use File.OpenRead when loading tool configuration (6.x backport) #29548
  • Use File.OpenRead when loading tool configuration #29540
  • Fix copy failures when building Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Razor.Tasks.csproj #29534
    Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Change the cppcli tests to use the package reference support #29369
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Set server GC for F# FSC/FSI #29506
    Area-FSharp
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2067603 #29494
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Include ApiSymbolExtensions in .NET SDK build #29553
    Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't Infer RID outside of dotnet publish for PublishSingleFile/PublishAot #29031
    area-runtime, Document for breaking changes, Area-CLI, Area-SingleFile, Area-NativeAOT
  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #29531
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29397
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix garbage collection for aliased workload packs #29508
    Area-Workloads
  • add class template #29518
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Change .templateengine folder path #29449
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add item template for directory.build.props and directory.build.targets #29526
    Area-Templates, Area-Common templates

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Add `private` and `namespace` accessibility modifiers for top-level types. #6794
  • [Proposal]: Make generated `Program` for top-level statements public by default #6769
  • Champion "Allow Generic Attributes" #124
    11.0

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Visual Basic "Move Type to..." refactoring for nested types duplicates entire parent type #66018
  • IDE2001 codefix is offered but does nothing #66017
    Backlog
  • Perpetual 15-20% CPU Utilization from `ServiceHub.RoslynCodeAnalysisService.exe` #66014
  • Enums don't nest in Document Outline depending on formatting #66012
  • Find all references for preprocessor symbol does not yield any results #66009
    Backlog
  • "Go To Implementation" doesn't find all implementations #66008
  • Flaky tests - Service hub cancellation #65999

Closed

  • Source generators in multi-targeted project being loaded twice #65996
  • `CompilationUnitSyntax.Members[i].ToFullString()` skips `#endif` if it's at the end of the file #66019
  • Semantic snippets: `cw` snippet adds using even when not necessary #64922
    Backlog
  • `AsPublicInterfaceImplementation` doesn't handle expression-bodied correctly. #65931
  • Override autocompletion does not work correctly when an attribute precedes the declaration #64887
    Backlog
  • [Question] `FileScopedNamespaceDeclarationSyntax` -> `NamespaceDeclarationSyntax` transformation #65998
  • CSharpNavigationBar.TestProperties is flaky #65988

PullRequests

Created

  • Update code style + dotnet-format #66021
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Consolidate IsExternalInit definitions #66020
    Area-Compilers
  • OptionKey clean-up and integration tests #66016
    Area-IDE
  • Mimick `.await` completions as snippets #66015
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fixes and improvements for Run Code Analysis command #66010
    Area-Analyzers
  • Move some of `Roslyn.Utilities` using statements into namespace block #66007
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge features/SharedSyntaxTrees into dev17.6 #66003
    Area-IDE
  • Disable spell checker for integration tests #66000
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update analyzers package version #65997
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Attempt to reenable tests disabled because of messagepack issue. #66013
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix crash while deserializing DiagnosticDataLocation #66005
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge 17.6-vs-deps back into release/dev17.6 #65991
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #66006
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove main-vs-deps #65990
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps back into main #65989
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Bump nuget version to ensure the correct version for .NET7 gets deplo… #66002
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Avoid boxing in BoundDagTest.GetHashCode #65939
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Ban usage of public options in Roslyn #65930
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Adding AsPublicInterfaceImplementation ability to handle expression-bodied #65984
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Allow multiline override #65395
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Improve sharing of trees when changing project configuration #65974
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Wait for next input prompt to avoid duplicate output read #65978
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #66004
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Delete unused type #65945
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add support for distinct LSP diagnostic categories in LSP Pull Diagnostics. #65985
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update all linked files to have the same content object instances when updating the workspace's solution. #65885
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #65992
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65993
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/SharedSyntaxTrees #65995
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2066786 #65986

Updated

  • Reenable quick info tests #65886
    Area-IDE
  • Update PublicAPI.Shipped for 17.4 #65956
    Area-Infrastructure, Needs API Review
  • Breaking change: Disallow raw-string-literal interpolations at start of line when indentation-whitespace is present. #65973
    Area-Compilers
  • Emit `DecimalConstantAttribute` for synthesized delegates and local functions #65777
    Area-Compilers
  • reduce the amount of time that we switch from a background thread to … #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Fix line breaks between members when a property has an initializer #65924
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Adjust calculation of invocation escape when return type is ref to ref struct #65857
    Area-Compilers
  • Support MemberNotNull on required members in nullable analysis #65987
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Deadlock in Blazor WASM + CosmoClient that happens in .net7 but not .net6 #45595
  • ResultContext<TOptions>.Result missing nullable annotation #45594
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #45592
  • Case insensitivity in enum route binding #45590
  • IActionInvokerProvider & UseStatusCodePagesWithReExecute 3.1 to net 6 difference #45589
    8.0-preview1
  • "Standalone" Blazor custom elements #45588
  • Using SignalR in Unity - The method or operation is not implemented #45586
  • EmbeddedFileProvider: Not recognizing correct manifest resource names #45585
    Backlog
  • After upgrade from .NET6 To .NET 7 (AddScoped IHostEnvironmentAuthenticationStateProvider) lifetime loading without ending #45583

Closed

  • Helix InstallLocalDb sometimes hangs on windows.11 queue #38819
    8.0-preview1
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #45544
  • Perf improvement: json, json_nodejs #45560
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #45571
  • Quarantine WriteAsJsonAsync_AsyncEnumerable_ClosedConnecton #45557
    Test failures
  • Programmatically acquire assets path for RCL assets (_content folder) #45531
  • "The signature key was not found" when using dotnet user-jwts bearer token #45584
  • [Minimal API] Route, Query and Header parameter names are ignored when using WithOpenApi extension method #45542
    8.0-preview1

PullRequests

Created

  • Adding untyped JsonTypeInfo overloads #45593
    area-runtime
  • Fix support for parameter names sourced from attributes (#45572) #45591
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks
  • Add support for {**catch-all routes} in Blazor #45587
    area-blazor
  • Add ambiguous route analyzer #45582
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Reimplement the default object pool for improved performance #45251
    Perf, area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • remove duplicate null check #45575
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Try running Diagnostics.FunctionalTests in Helix #45573
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix support for parameter names sourced from attributes #45572
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Update selenium dependency versions #44834
  • Support STJ Polymorphism #45405
    area-web-frameworks
  • Support checking for required members in minimal APIs #45084
  • Bump SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22607.6 #44925
    area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2067454 #45566
    area-infrastructure
  • [AOT] Fix Web UI AOT Warnings #45580
    area-blazor
  • Get EmptyHttpResult in RDF via reflection #45354
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet-trace always detects 100% CPU usage #3554

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update tutorial scenario - App is experiencing intermittent exceptions #3550

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Editor words sometimes out of focus. #12120
  • Items in CollectionView overlaying each other on Windows #12118
  • Removing a background on iOS does not remove the background #12117
  • Triggering a change with the ContainerView results in incorrect things #12116
  • MAUI (only #if WINDOWS) Grid event Page_SizeChanged doesnt get the correct width of the grid after pressing button maximize #12115
  • CarouselView current item isn't changing #12113
  • Can not start the Android Emulator with Visual Studio 17.4.3 #12110
  • Maui Resizetizer Error - Unable to allocate pixels for the bitmap when using an SVG image #12109
  • CheckBox cannot be unchecked via read-only binding #12106
    Backlog
  • Shell Tabbar doesn't behave correctly when changing tab icon image (through binding or style triggers) #12105
    Backlog
  • Grid: [Windows] Auto Row definition does not fully visualise its elements #12103
    Backlog
  • InvalidProgramException when binding to a static property #12101
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI Class Library build in the Release config fails to compile for the Windows target whereas Debug config works fine #12100
  • Content inside frame not visible #12099
    Backlog
  • ListView create objects inside ItemTemplate two times on Windows #12090
    Backlog
  • Flickering WebView #12089
  • MapHandler not found exception when using build in Map-feature #12088
  • AppIcon does not deliver what it suggests #12087
  • Better error messages for XAML #12086
    Backlog
  • .NET Maui IOS Release build does not contain iTunesArtwork? #12085
  • java.lang.IllegalStateException: Handshake has already been started TcpClient & SslStream #12084
  • Label text binding wrong vertical space calculation in CollectionView Header #12083
    Backlog
  • The system tray in WeatherTwentyOne is crashing when publishing as exe #12081
  • MAUI apps crash on launch on Windows after Visual Studio update - code 2147942405 (0x80070005) #12080
  • [Proposal] Bring up nightly release builds like on Xamarin.Forms #12079
    Backlog

Closed

  • iOS CollectionView size calculation #6605
    Backlog
  • How does a.NET MAUI project pass github CI/DI check? #12107
  • Numeric Keyboard not working with DisplayPromptAsync #7470
  • MAUI app crash with .net7 #11830
  • TabbedPage for Android with child navigation shows the Tabbar #9512
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Placeholder text is not vertically centered on Entry on windows #8770
  • Placeholder text alignment not respected on Windows ref #3808 #7844
    Backlog
  • [Bug] Mark one of the Geocoding APIs as obsolete #2209
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Appshell menu item click, content page changes with glitch #12051
  • iOS app crashes using TestFlight #11276

PullRequests

Created

  • Use the UpdateHasContainer method everywhere #12119
  • Only set PublishReadyToRun for apps and not libs #12114
  • Attach the gestures to the correct (container or platform) view #12108
    area/Xaml </>
  • Rename W2DImage to PlatformImage #12104
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Notify CheckBox Foreground update after Color changed (alternative) #12102
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox

Merged

  • Update Essentials Geocoding Docs #11921
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials FilePicker API Docs #11870
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials HapticFeedback API Docs #11930
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump System.Text.Json from 7.0.0 to 7.0.1 #12095
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Improve design type converters #12062
  • Set bottom margin back to zero when removing Bottom Tabs #12076
  • Set windows placeholder vertical text alignment #12059
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authorization from 7.0.0 to 7.0.1 #12091
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12075
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Update Essentials Gyroscope API Docs #11925
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix Windows CollectionView EmptyView alignment #10845
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • [Android] Improve CollectionView scrolling (Shadows) #10523
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Core] Propagate IsEnabled property from Layouts to children #6892
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, .NET 7 Planning
  • Resolve some life cycle issues with `TabbedPage` when nested inside a `NavigationPage` #11530
    platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, area/TabbedPage
  • Added StartPath to get/set initial BlazorWebView URL #11942
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Modify generics on replaced mappers inside `Controls` to cover more types. #11907
  • Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecessary parent) #11439
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • Fix: Binding doesn't respect special IValueConverter return values #12060
    community ✨
  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • Implement Keyboard on SearchBarHandler #9851
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Update Essentials Map API Docs #11936
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Notify CheckBox Foreground update after Color changed (not before) #9678
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox
  • [macOS] Fix crash using Shell SearchHandler on Catalyst #11926
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/shell 🐢
  • Fix shapes sizing and alignment #9607
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InvalidOperationException when mapping properties of different types to the same column #29859
  • Opportunities to reduce binary size with trimming/NativeAOT #29858
  • Wrong order by clause generated when sorting by tph property #29856
  • The QueryTranslationPostprocessor.Process() executed only once when with AsSplitQuery() method #29855
  • Plan for Entity Framework Core 8 (EF8) #29853
    Discussions
  • Cleanup: consider converting comments on private fields into xml docs #29852

Closed

  • Filtering over owned entity nested in another owned entity throws InvalidOperationException #29812
  • dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold with user secret #29809
  • Thoughts on a DbCommandInterceptor to skip empty queries #29768
  • The instance of entity type 'Domain' cannot be tracked because another instance with the key value '{Id: 2}' is already being tracked. When attaching existing entities, ensure that only one entity instance with a given key value is attached. #29749
  • AutoInclude does not respect QueryTrackingBehavior.NoTracking #29728
  • Database migration creates wrong name when AspNet Identity Role is customized #29688
  • How to create the query which is translated into SQL declaring multiple entries deletion by WHERE condition? #29846
  • Query/MQ: consider making ExpressionPrinter static #29851

PullRequests

Created

  • SQLite Scaffolding: Reverse engineer collation #29857
  • [release/7.0] Avoid infinite loop during foreign key discovery #29850
    Servicing-consider
  • Don't try to discover FK properties when conflicting with 2 or more other FKs #29849

Merged

  • Add static Print methods to ExpressionPrinter #29854

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Allow underscores in identifiers again #29822
    Servicing-consider
  • Fix to #29513 - Json: improve projection deduplication for scenarios containing collection indexers #29808

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • UseNonPortableIlasmPackageOverride? #15129

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactor source-build archives infra #15135
  • Move git-info dir into prereqs #15134
  • Update strings to target 8.0 and the release notes link to be 8.0 #15132

Merged

  • Cleanup top level source-build directories #15126
  • Delete some test folders once run to not leave them on the machine #15094

Updated

  • Run VMR's pipelines from the VMR directly #15124
